name: smelling-salts
flavor_text:
This attack’s power is doubled when used on a
target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s
paralysis, however.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect_text_simple: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
